author: deweese
msg: Fixed my fix for broken-link images...

author: deweese
msg: 1) When a Broken link image is displayed it now attaches a desc tag
on the 'i' in a circle (new element) that tries to explain why you
got the broken link.  When viewed interactively in Batik you will
get a tool-tip if you park your cursor over this for a second.
2) Modified the Broken link image a touch, so it is a semi-transparent
white rather than being completely transparent in most places.
3) Fixed a few 'typos' in Vincent's tool-tip support stuff.
4) Finished adding 'touch' statements in the set methods of Rables
(I had a bunch of modified files sitting in emaces from the
first round).

author: deweese
msg: 1) Cleaned up notion of 'suspendExecution'.
Required addition of transitory 'Suspending' state.
2) Augmented the Test code to test random suspension and resumption by
two threads. :)
3) Split synchronization mutexes to allow for adding Runnables while
runHandler methods are running (wasn't comfortable assuming these
were 'quick').
